title: Filter style wire frame
description: Shows all features that do not comply to the filter of the BIM Building Scene Layer as wire frame with an edge line.

type.description: Declares filter style of type hide.

edge.description: An object defining the solid edge of a feature. [See more](https://developers.arcgis.com/web-scene-specification/objects/solidEdges/) information on supported renderer types in ArcGIS clients.
